modName: Newlyna Armor and Jewelry Set for DG
summary:
11 pieces of armor and 4 pieces of jewelry for my Nord/VampireLord-Assassin/Archer playtrough...
- works with any UNP UV based body replacer as long as you equip Top/Gloves/Boots
- uses HDT HighHeels and BBP
- Modular (take a look at my Screenshots)
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma][size=4][b]Newlyna Armor&Jewelry Set for DG [/b][/size]
[/font]
[size=3]11 pieces of armor and 4 pieces of jewelry for my Nord/VampireLord-Assassin/Archer playtrough...


[size=4]Quick Facts:[/size]

[size=3]- should work with any UNP UV based body replacer as long as you equip Top/Gloves/Boots[/size]
- no weight slider support (Armor is based on Dream Girl (Support Bra) body at full weight)
- no support for Beast Races (Earring will only work on default human ears)
- not performance friendly
- works with Enhanced Blood and Wet&Cold
- Modular (take a look at my Screenshots)

[b]Contains Nudity: if you equip the Top and don't equip Panty or Shorts your lower body parts will be exposed, even if you use a Nevernude Body[/b] [b]Replacer[/b]...

[size=4]Requirements for Main file:[/size]

minimum:
1. BBP Skeleton (should work with all available BBP/TBBP Skeletons, but not tested to be honest – I use XPMS)
2. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System[/url]
3. UNP UV Body Textures (DG/UNP/UNPB/SevenBase...)

maximum – every piece of armor can be equipped on its own without issues:
1.BBP Skeleton (should work with all available BBP/TBBP Skeletons, but not tested to be honest – I use XPMS)
2.[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System[/url]
3.[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41443/?]Dream Girl[/url] + optional BBP meshes
4.weight slider ingame is set to maximum

[size=4]Optional downloads:[/size]
1.if you don't like the colored nails you can download a natural version
2.noHDT Patch, removes the PlatformBoots, but you can try the armor without HDT installed, if you plan on playing this way you should get some Dreamgirl compatible Boots. UNP Boots won't work...

[size=4]How to get:[/size]
All items are craftable at the forge under Leather and Jewlry - look for Newlyna

….
alternative using console:
type „[i]help newlyna[/i]“
[size=2]last item in the list should be the container...form id xx008406[/size]
type „[i]player.placeatme xx008406 1[/i]“ (replace xx with the correct numbers)
[size=2]if done correctly there should spawn a large urn at your feet, containing all items
[/size]

Items and Slots used:

32 Top/Body
33 Gloves
35 Necklace
36 Ring
37 Boots
42 Circlet (Helmet)
43 Earring
45+59 Vest
48 Navel Piercing
49 Shorts
52 Panty
53 Chaps/Stockings
54 Belt
56 Corset
57+59 Pauldron
59 Sleeve (attached to Pauldron)


[size=4]Gameplay Balance:[/size]
It's not as good as Glass Armor, but you get two additonal enchantments (Navel Piercing/Earring)... you can't temper or enchant all armor items...


[size=4]Known Issues:[/size]
There might be some minor clipping issues (elbows/knees/neck/shoulders), depending on pose mods and animations you use... I don't think that I can do much about that...
If you encounter clipping around the breasts with HDT PE enabled , you should change back to BBP Skeleton without PE support, works for me...

[size=4]Version:[/size]
0.8 First Release …


[size=4]Install/Uninstall:[/size]

Use NMM or MO to download and install...


otherwise:
manual installation:
drop all files into your Data Folder...
Uninstall
goto data/meshes/nos and delete folder Newlyna
goto data/textures/nos and delete folder Newlyna
goto skyrim/data and delete NewlynaArmor.esp


[size=4]Credits:[/size]

Meshes/Texures:

I've used quite a lot assets from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/66282/?]Petrovich[/url] , those are the mods containing the meshes I started with [size=3](go and endorse those mods if you like my work)[/size]:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41443/?]Dream Girl[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43377/?]DG High Heels[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42380/?]DG Leather Clothes[/url]


Leather Texures: www.wildtextures.com
Gimp Brushes: www.obsidiandawn.com

Mods used in Screenshots (not all I'm afraid):

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53100/?]Gameplay Performance ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52423/?]Pure Weather [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41655/?]Female Body Textures for Dream Girl Body and SG Female Textures Renewal [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38829/?]BVFE - Better Vampire Fangs and Eyes [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?]DYNAVISION - Dynamic Depth of Field [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/?]Ponytail Hairstyles v3_0 [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35677/?]The Coenaculi - RaceMenu Plugin for Tattoos[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url]
Thanks for Poses to Halofarm: http://mod.dysintropi.me/

Thanks to Bethesda for creating this awesome game

[size=4]Tools used:[/size]

Blender
Niftools
Nifskope
Gimp 2.8
Creation Kit
TES5Edit

[size=4]Permissions:[/size]

Do not redistribute or upload to any other sites or Steam Workshop.
If you want to retexture or edit the meshes: feel free to do so but provide proper credit to Petrovich and me, and still no upload to other sites.[/size]
author: Nostromo79
